description: This file contains the implementation of focus management classes for Android TV navigation, specifically handling directional navigation via DPAD for a grid and linear focus models.

classes.name: GridFocusManager
classes.description: Manages directional focus on a grid layout with rows and columns, allowing movement up, down, left, and right with optional wrapping.

classes.name: LinearFocusManager
classes.description: Manages focus on a linear list of items, allowing movement left and right with optional wrapping.

methods.name: setFocus
methods.description: Sets the focus to a specific grid cell or list item.

methods.name: moveUp
methods.description: Moves focus up within the grid, returning true if successful.

methods.name: moveDown
methods.description: Moves focus down within the grid, returning true if successful.

methods.name: moveLeft
methods.description: Moves focus left in the grid or list, with optional wrapping.

methods.name: moveRight
methods.description: Moves focus right in the grid or list, with optional wrapping.
